title: what is this hot metal Gotham/Avenir lookalike?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019055316im_/http:/typophile.com/files/notGotham_5410.jpg)

This sample is 6pt set straight, circa 1980, and I'm assuming it's hot metal, but I could be wrong. Seems wider than Avenir/Gotham, tall x-height, characteristic E,a,g.

Mac McGrew did not come through, so I'm asking you!
author: dcastillo
